faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions about our services? Here you'll find answers to the most common questions.

items.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
items.answer: Development time varies by plan: Starter (2-3 weeks), Business (4-6 weeks), Professional (6-8 weeks), and Enterprise (8-12 weeks). Custom SaaS projects are scoped individually. We provide a detailed timeline during the initial consultation.

items.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely! You can upgrade your plan at any time as your business grows. We'll help you with the smooth transition and ensure all your content is preserved during the upgrade.

items.question: What exactly does technical support include?
items.answer: Technical support includes troubleshooting, answering questions, clarifying concerns, and providing solutions for a seamless experience. Response times vary by plan: Starter (48 hours), Business (24 hours), Professional (12 hours priority), Enterprise (immediate dedicated support).

items.question: Do the prices include hosting and domain?
items.answer: Yes, all plans include hosting and domain for the first year. After the first year, there's an annual renewal fee to keep your site online, which we'll communicate in advance.

items.question: Do you offer custom plans outside of these options?
items.answer: Absolutely! If you need something special, don't worry; we'd be happy to assist you and offer the best option according to your needs. Contact us for a personalized quote.

items.question: How does the payment process work?
items.answer: We work with a flexible payment structure. Typically, we require a 50% deposit to start the project and the remaining 50% upon completion and your approval. We accept various payment methods for your convenience.
